cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM Community_Group JOIN Community_GroupMember ON Community_Group.GroupID = Community_GroupMember.MemberGroupID JOIN CMS_User ON Community_GroupMember.MemberUserID = CMS_User.UserID JOIN CMS_Role ON Community_Group.GroupID = CMS_Role.RoleGroupID WHERE Community_Group.GroupSiteID = @SiteID AND CMS_User.UserID = @UserID AND CMS_Role.RoleIsGroupAdministrator = 1 ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
